line.originaltext: Measure flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and chocolate chips into a large bowl.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing21, ing22, ing23, ing24}, ing29, "dry ingredients", "")

line.originaltext: Measure flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and chocolate chips into a large bowl.
Mix thoroughly, and make a well in the center.
line.annotation: mix(ing29, t3, ing30, "mixed dry ingredients", "mix thoroughly and make a well in the center")

line.originaltext: Beat the egg in a small bowl until frothy.
Beat the egg in a small bowl until frothy.
line.annotation: mix(ing25, t4, ing31, "beaten egg", "beat until frothy")

line.originaltext: Beat the egg in a small bowl until frothy.
Mix in cooking oil, milk, and bananas.
line.annotation: combine({ing26, ing27, ing28, ing31}, ing32, "mixed wet ingredients", "")
combine({ing30, ing32}, ing33, "batter", "pour mixture into the well")
mix(ing33, t3, ing34, "moistened batter", "stir only to moisten")

line.originaltext: Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes.
Bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing34, t6, ing35, "muffins", "bake at 400 degrees F (205 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes")
